snippet: A ballot initiative, Proposition 34, provides the chance to shut down the state’s costly and broken system of capital punishment.
abstract: Editorial supports Proposition 34 ballot initiative in California that will give voters chance to abolish capital punishment in state.
lead_paragraph: A ballot initiative, Proposition 34, provides the chance to shut down the state’s costly and broken system of capital punishment.

headline.seo: End the Death Penalty in California
headline.main: End the Death Penalty in California
headline.print_headline: End the Death Penalty in California
